row.process:
:SET &MANDANT# = "" :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "bbsbat" :SET &ORASCRIPT# = "ju_status.sql"
cat << __EOF__ > &RUNDIR#/&ORASCRIPT# SELECT VALUTA_DAT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DAT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS GENERIERT, MANDANT, AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ, CASE AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ WHEN 1650 THEN 'PRIVAT' WHEN 1651 THEN 'BAV-EINZ' WHEN 1652 THEN 'BAV-KOLL' WHEN 1653 THEN 'KOLL' END AS VETRAGSART, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(VERARB_SKZ_VEK,1,1) = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS OFFEN, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(VERARB_SKZ_VEK,1,1) = '1' AND SUBSTR(AKTION_SKZ_VEK,1,1) = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS VERARBEITET_MIT_AKTION, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(VERARB_SKZ_VEK,1,1) = '1' AND SUBSTR(AKTION_SKZ_VEK,1,1) = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS VERARBEITET_OHNE_AKTION, COUNT(*) AS GESAMT FROM TBBAUSLOES WHERE AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ IN (1650,1651,1652,1653) AND VALUTA_DAT = (&VALUTA#) GROUP BY VALUTA_DAT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DAT, 'YYYYMMDD'), MANDANT, AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ ORDER BY 1,4,3,2 ; __EOF__
:INC JOBI.SQL_CSV
exit $rc
